title: "Infosys and Microsoft collaborate to bring enhanced AI-enabled solutions"
excerpt: "Infosys announced that it is collaborating with Microsoft to jointly develop industry solutions that will leverage their respective artificial intelligence (AI) tools and services – Infosys Topaz and Microsoft’s Azure OpenAI Service and Azure Cognitive Services."
